level.heading: Grocery ambassador program.
level.text: The Deputy Mayor for Planning and Economic Development shall designate a District employee as the grocery ambassador to assist retailers in building or renovating grocery stores in eligible areas by:
Providing research and data on eligible areas with insufficient grocery access;
Coordinating with all relevant District agencies and public utilities;
Providing assistance in obtaining and expediting regulatory procedures and approvals; and
